function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perception of top-down control measures as oppressive","Impact":"Further marginalization and political opposition","Mitigation":"Engage with community leaders, provide clear information and involve residents in decision-making","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, information sharing tools","People":"Residents of informal settlements, marginalized communities","Owner":"Local community leaders, NGOs, government agencies"},{"Description":"Ignored public health regulations in informal settlements","Impact":"Repressive enforcement and sporadic crackdowns","Mitigation":"Adapt regulations to fit the realities of informal settlements, provide resources for compliance, and engage with community leaders for enforcement","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, resource allocation tools","People":"Residents of informal settlements, government agencies, community leaders","Owner":"Government agencies, NGOs, community leaders"},{"Description":"Contested governance structures and plural leadership","Impact":"Tensions and competition among diverse leadership groups","Mitigation":"Facilitate dialogue and mediation among leadership groups, provide resources to alleviate tensions, and promote inclusive governance structures","Technologies":"Mediation platforms, resource allocation tools","People":"Leadership groups in informal settlements, community representatives","Owner":"Local community leaders, NGOs, government agencies"}]}
